modName: The Ultimate NPC Overhaul and Immersive Weapons PATCH
summary: This patch is required for the usage of UNO and Immersive Weapons together. It will give the UNO NPC's the Immersive Weapons. UNO and Immersive Weapons are required.
descriptionHtml:
This Patch makes the usage of The Ultimate NPC Overhaul and Immersive Weapons together, possible. 

LOAD ORDER HAS TO BE

Immersive Weapons.esp
UNO - NPC Overhaul.esp
The Ultimate NPC Overhaul and Immersive Weapons PATCH.esp


Immersive Weapons Mod should be cleaned with TES5 Edit. 

If you experience Crash to Desktop you have not installed UNO with all it's required Hairpacks.



EDIT: AS OF NOW THE MOD AUTHOR OF UNO SET HIS NPC OVERHAUL TO HIDDEN, FOR WHAT EVER REASON, THIS FILE WILL REMAIN ON THE NEXUS.
author: Kanakenschubser
